## 亚马逊Apple Watch SE/Series 10折扣活动

亚马逊目前正在对Apple Watch Series 10和Apple Watch SE的GPS和蜂窝网络型号提供多项折扣。百思买在大多数情况下也同步了这些优惠。此外，Woot正在进行Solo Loop和Braided Solo Loop表带的大规模促销活动。

### Apple Watch Series 10 优惠

![Apple Watch Series 10 紫色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/XPfvHrLTsujXsyVdhn5XG3KRtJc=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/apple-watch-series-10-purple.jpeg?lossy)

*   **42毫米GPS型号**：售价299.00美元，原价399.00美元，降价100美元。
*   **46毫米GPS型号**：售价329.00美元，原价429.00美元，降价100美元。

这两款Apple Watch Series 10型号的价格均创下历史新低，并提供约5-6种表壳颜色和表带款式选择。

### Apple Watch SE 优惠

![Apple Watch SE 紫色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-0uwIMqve4367R314yQKUCvX_qk=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/apple-watch-se-purple.jpeg?lossy)

*   **40毫米GPS型号**：售价169.00美元，原价249.00美元，降价80美元。这是2025年迄今为止的最佳价格。
    *   可选颜色：星光色、银色和午夜铝色。
*   **44毫米GPS型号**：售价199.00美元，原价279.00美元，降价80美元。
    *   可选颜色：午夜色、银色和星光铝色，并有多种表带尺寸。

### 其他信息

*   MacRumors是亚马逊的联盟合作伙伴，通过其链接购买可能会获得少量佣金。
*   用户可以访问MacRumors的Apple Deals汇总页面，了解过去一周最佳的苹果相关优惠。
*   建议订阅Deals Newsletter，以获取2025年最佳优惠信息。

items.title: 头条新闻：iOS 26 Beta 2、iPhone 17 颜色传闻等 (原标题: Top Stories: iOS 26 Beta 2, iPhone 17 Color Rumors, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
# Apple 最新动态：iOS 26 Beta 2、iPhone 17 传闻及更多
![top stories 2025 06 28](https://images.macrumors.com/t/47FXbrHf54DAdjuNFkO5YJtF-PI=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/top-stories-2025-06-28.jpg?lossy)
苹果公司正在积极推进 iOS 26 及其相关主要操作系统的 Beta 测试，本周向开发者发布了第二个 Beta 版本，与第一个 Beta 相比进行了一系列调整。此外，过去一周还出现了关于 iPhone 17 及未来机型的新传闻，而 CarPlay Ultra 似乎在一些汽车品牌中失宠。

## iOS 26 Beta 2 的新特性
苹果本周向开发者提供了 iOS 26 的第二个 Beta 版本，这是该新操作系统自 WWDC 主题演讲首次亮相以来的首次更改和改进。
![ios 26 beta 2 new feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/U-AomFoDfc3TOg2_B4I78PdrRek=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-beta-2-new-feature.jpg?lossy)
主要变化包括：
*   **控制中心设计改进**：采用了新的“液态玻璃”（Liquid Glass）设计。
*   **新铃声**：在第一个 Beta 中被发现隐藏的铃声，在本周的 Beta 中正式可用。
*   **Safari 和钱包应用调整**：对这两个应用进行了一些优化。

## iPhone 17 基础型号颜色传闻
在每代 iPhone 发布前，颜色选项一直是热门的猜测话题。
![iPhone 17 Base Model Rumored to Come in New Green and Purple Colors Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Hx1X3CjrazH0MPQ8tp3s_HlPTw8=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iPhone-17-Base-Model-Rumored-to-Come-in-New-Green-and-Purple-Colors-Feature.jpg?lossy)
*   有传闻称，苹果正在测试针对普通 iPhone 17 型号的**新紫色和绿色选项**。
*   尽管两种颜色都在测试，但最终可能只有一种会投入生产，**紫色型号的可能性最大**。

## 20 周年 iPhone 可能不会采用全屏设计
关于苹果长期 iPhone 路线图的全屏设计存在争议。
![Beyond iPhone 16 notch less](https://images.macrumors.com/t/2DvOoq98ICY3tfV5vA-OBtuHBB4=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/Beyond-iPhone-16-notch-less.jpg?lossy)
*   **Mark Gurman (Bloomberg) 的说法**：苹果计划在 2026 年的 iPhone 机型中缩小灵动岛（Dynamic Island）尺寸，并在 2027 年的 Pro 机型中转向带曲面玻璃的全屏设计。
*   **显示分析师 Ross Young 的观点**：他认为时间线会更长。
    *   2026 年：灵动岛缩小。
    *   2028 年：进一步缩小，所有剩余的 Face ID 组件移至显示屏下方，摄像头保持独立。
    *   2030 年：所有组件才能完全移至显示屏下方，实现真正的全屏设计。

## 苹果 CarPlay Ultra 合作伙伴面临阻力
苹果的下一代车载软件系统 CarPlay Ultra 正面临汽车制造商日益增长的抵制。
![Apple CarPlay Ultra cluster Now Playing](https://images.macrumors.com/t/j21vPlavL8l8r_7BvzNZgc2ttQY=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/Apple-CarPlay-Ultra-cluster-Now-Playing.jpg?lossy)
*   **退出支持的品牌**：根据《金融时报》的报道，包括德国豪华制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰、奥迪，以及沃尔沃、极星（Polestar）和雷诺在内的几个主要品牌正在撤回他们此前支持升级版仪表盘软件的承诺。
*   **继续支持的品牌**：保时捷仍承诺在未指定的时间范围内支持该功能。现代、起亚和捷尼赛思上个月刚宣布成为新合作伙伴，似乎也仍在支持。

## iOS 26 的新电池续航模式
iOS 26 在 iPhone 上引入了可选的“自适应电源模式”（Adaptive Power Mode）。
![iPhone 16 Battery Life Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JZ3D7rgxFWDi_UwOWjUFVreOJfQ=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/iPhone-16-Battery-Life-Feature.jpg?lossy)
*   **功能描述**：苹果表示，该模式可在必要时进行“小的性能调整”以延长 iPhone 电池续航，例如略微降低显示屏亮度或允许某些活动“花费更长时间”。
*   **兼容性**：该功能需要“Apple Intelligence”才能运行，因此仅限于部分最新 iPhone 型号：
    *   iPhone 15 Pro
    *   iPhone 15 Pro Max
    *   所有 iPhone 16 型号
    *   所有即将推出的 iPhone 17 型号无疑也将支持。

## iPhone 上的数字驾照和身份识别
iPhone 钱包应用中的数字驾照目前已在美国 9 个州和波多黎各获得支持，另有 8 个州已签署协议未来将采用此功能。
![apple wallet drivers license feature iPhone 15 pro](https://images.macrumors.com/t/i3Gp72Avg69qGF_w3zAY5PxIS5E=/400x0/article-new/2024/04/apple-wallet-drivers-license-feature-iPhone-15-pro.jpg?lossy)
*   **新功能**：iOS 26 还将引入基于美国护照的新数字身份识别（Digital ID）。
*   **使用场景**：全国用户将能够在国内旅行时，在选定的机场安检点使用此数字护照进行身份验证。
*   **限制**：它不能替代国际旅行所需的实体护照。
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布了 iOS 26 Beta 2，带来了控制中心设计改进和新铃声。iPhone 17 基础型号传闻将新增紫色和绿色。关于 iPhone 全面屏设计的路线图存在争议，分析师预测可能要到 2030 年才能实现。CarPlay Ultra 正面临汽车制造商的抵制，部分品牌已撤回支持。iOS 26 新增的自适应电源模式仅限部分最新 iPhone 型号。此外，iPhone 钱包应用支持更多州的数字驾照，iOS 26 还将引入基于美国护照的数字身份识别。

items.content:
Apple is moving right along with beta testing on iOS 26 and related versions of its other major operating systems, releasing the second betas to developers this week with an array of tweaks compared to the first betas.


The past week also saw some fresh rumors about the iPhone 17 and beyond, while CarPlay Ultra seems to be falling out of favor with some car brands, so read on below for all the details on these stories and more!

Everything New in iOS 26 Beta 2


Apple this week provided developers with the second beta of iOS 26, introducing the first changes and refinements to the new operating system since it debuted at the WWDC keynote. Because we're early in the beta testing process, there are quite a few tweaks to ‌iOS 26‌ with this new beta, and we've rounded them up in an article and accompanying video.


Among the changes are improvements to the look of Control Center with the new Liquid Glass design, a new ringtone that was discovered hiding in the first beta and which officially became available in this week's beta, some tweaks for Safari and the Wallet app, and more.

iPhone 17 Base Model Rumored to Come in New Purple and Green Colors


One of the most popular topics for rumor and speculation ahead of each iPhone generation's unveiling is the color options for the various models, and this year is no exception.


According to one source with a mixed track record, Apple has been testing new purple and green color options for the regular iPhone 17 model, although it's possible only one of them will make it to production and that would most likely be the purple model. We'll see in September if that turns out to be accurate!

20th-Anniversary iPhone May Not Feature an All-Screen Design After All


There's a rumor controversy brewing with regard to Apple's extended iPhone roadmap, kicked off by Bloomberg's Mark Gurman claims over the past month that Apple is aiming to shrink the size of the Dynamic Island in the 2026 iPhone models before moving to an all-screen design with curved glass for the Pro models in 2027.


Display analyst Ross Young claimed this week, however, that the timeline will be a bit longer than that, with the smaller Dynamic Island in 2026 being followed by further shrinkage in 2028 that will see all remaining Face ID elements move underneath the display with the camera remaining separate. Young believes it won't be until 2030 that everything will be able to move under the display panel to deliver the full all-screen design.

These Apple CarPlay Ultra Partners Now Say They Won't Support It


Apple is facing mounting resistance from automakers over CarPlay Ultra, the next-generation version of its CarPlay software system for vehicles that was officially launched last month.


A new Financial Times report claims several major brands are walking back their earlier commitments to support the upgraded dashboard software. German luxury manufacturers Mercedes-Benz and Audi have both distanced themselves from the system, along with Volvo, Polestar, and Renault.

Porsche remains committed to supporting the feature in an unspecified time frame, and Hyundai, Kia, and Genesis were just announced as new partners last month, so they appear to still be on board as well.

iOS 26's New Battery Life Mode Available Only on These iPhone Models


iOS 26 introduces an opt-in Adaptive Power Mode on the iPhone, which Apple says can make "small performance adjustments" when necessary to extend an iPhone's battery life, including slightly lowering the display brightness or allowing some activities to "take a little longer."


The feature will only be available on some of Apple's most recent iPhone models, however, as it requires Apple Intelligence in order to function. That means Adaptive Power Mode will be limited to the iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, and all iPhone 16 models. All iPhone 17 models coming later this year will of course undoubtedly support it.

iPhone Driver's Licenses: These 17 U.S. States Offer Them or Will Later


Digital driver's licenses in the Wallet app on iPhone are currently supported in nine U.S. states and Puerto Rico, but Apple previously announced an additional eight states that have signed on to adopt the feature in the future, and there will almost certainly be others.


iOS 26 will also introduce a new Digital ID based on a U.S. passport. Users nationwide will be able to use this digital passport for identity verification at select airport security checkpoints when traveling domestically, though it won't be a replacement for a physical passport needed when traveling internationally.

MacRumors Newsletter


Each week, we publish an email newsletter like this highlighting the top Apple stories, making it a great way to get a bite-sized recap of the week hitting all of the major topics we've covered and tying together related stories for a big-picture view.

So if you want to have top stories like the above recap delivered to your email inbox each week, subscribe to our newsletter!

items.title: iOS 26 中的 Safari：从设计到隐私的全面更新 (原标题: Safari in iOS 26: Everything New From Design to Privacy)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
Apple 在 iOS 26 中对其多款内置应用进行了更新，其中 Safari 浏览器迎来了多项显著变化，涵盖了全新的外观、更新的布局和新的功能集。这些更新预计将在今年秋季 iOS 26 公开发布时推出。

## 主要更新亮点

### 1. 液态玻璃设计 (Liquid Glass Design)

Safari 采用了与 Apple 其他应用相同的液态玻璃设计，主要体现在地址栏、标签页视图和按钮上。

*   **视觉效果**：按钮和标签栏呈现半透明的液态玻璃外观，能透视更多网页背景内容。
*   **紧凑性**：标签栏更紧凑，占用空间更少，整体设计更圆润。
*   **动态收缩**：向下滚动时，标签栏会收缩成一个只显示网址的小条，将焦点完全集中在网页内容上；向上滚动时则恢复完整大小。

![safari liquid glass](https://images.macrumors.com/t/IFJmVQZFqnIvK4NhlpDOPN0l8BI=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/safari-liquid-glass.jpg?lossy)

### 2. 更新的布局

iOS 26 引入了新的紧凑设计选项，同时保留了用户偏爱的顶部和底部标签页视图布局，可在“设置”应用的 Safari 部分进行配置。

![ios 26 safari design light mode](https://images.macrumors.com/t/iKxFTq6qtcnMNgcsH5XQGrySBYs=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-safari-design-light-mode.jpg?lossy)

*   **紧凑布局**：分享、书签和标签页选项被收纳在标签栏左侧的三点按钮后。这种设计更简洁，但对于频繁使用这些功能的用户可能会稍显不便。后退箭头现在可以分化为前进和后退选项。翻译和阅读器模式等设置仍可通过网址旁的小图标访问。

![ios 26 safari options](https://images.macrumors.com/t/I2XvEGLhG9aBzIpBk21VEw6I89U=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-safari-options.jpg?lossy)

*   **顶部和底部视图**：与 iOS 18 中的设置类似，但融入了新的液态玻璃外观。两个栏都变得更纤细，不再占据显示屏的整个宽度。

![ios 26 safari menu collapsed](https://images.macrumors.com/t/aHc16FOj63xJGT9Bja9MVEe7GR4=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-safari-menu-collapsed.jpg?lossy)

*   **标签页管理**：标签页管理也进行了重新设计。打开新标签页的“+”按钮仍在左侧，完成标签页操作后会出现蓝色对勾标记。标签页视图中央有一个滑块，显示当前标签组中打开的标签页数量。左右滑动可在标签组之间快速切换。通过显示屏顶部的下拉菜单可以切换个人资料，其他标签页管理工具可通过“···”图标访问。

![ios 26 safari tabs](https://images.macrumors.com/t/23VHeNB5J3gTiuccveih8WYcmVE=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-safari-tabs.jpg?lossy)

### 3. Web 应用

在 iOS 26 中，将网站添加到主屏幕后，它将始终作为 Web 应用打开。以前，Web 开发者需要进行配置才能实现此功能，现在即使未明确设置，网站也会自动作为专用 Web 应用打开。用户在将网站添加到主屏幕时，可以选择关闭“作为 Web 应用打开”选项，以便网站在 Safari 中打开。

![ios 26 web apps](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6kRsvMZEl1FElLt4zS7IwPtlGFA=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-web-apps.jpg?lossy)

### 4. 跟踪预防

高级指纹识别保护功能现在默认扩展到所有浏览活动，而不仅仅是私密浏览。此功能旨在阻止网站跟踪用户在不同网站上的设备使用情况。

![ios 26 tracking protection](https://images.macrumors.com/t/pdwWlBToQ6EXV84UY_POAQ599IU=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-tracking-protection.jpg?lossy)

### 5. HDR 图像支持

iOS 26 为 Safari 增加了 HDR 图像支持。HDR 图像具有更宽的动态范围，可呈现更亮的白色和更深的黑色，并改进了色域。在配备 XDR 显示屏的 iPhone 上，P3 HDR 图像现在将按预期显示。

### 6. SVG 图标支持

Safari 支持 SVG 文件格式作为界面中所有图标的显示方式，包括起始页、Web 应用、Safari 标签页、菜单等。SVG 优于 PNG，因为它们可以无损缩放，这对于需要以不同尺寸显示的图标尤为重要。

### 7. WebGPU

iOS 26 中的 Safari 包含了 WebGPU，这是 Apple 一直在 Safari Technology Preview 中测试的功能。WebGPU 更直接地映射到 Metal 和底层的 iPhone 硬件，虽然不是用户可以直接使用的功能，但会带来显著益处：

*   基于网络的**游戏**将能以更低的 CPU 负载实现更高的帧率和更好的效果。
*   **照片编辑器、3D 建模网站、CAD 查看器**以及进行设备端机器学习的网站将运行更快，同时消耗更少电量。
*   **要求**：需要 iPhone 15 Pro 或更高版本。

### 8. 数字凭证 API (Digital Credentials API)

Apple 为 Safari 增加了对 W3C 数字凭证 API 的支持，这意味着网站可以请求 Apple Wallet 中的身份证明文件（如驾照），用于私密安全的身份和年龄验证。

*   **“通过网页验证钱包”功能**：利用数字凭证 API 和生物识别认证。网站可以请求用户的出生日期等信息，而无需接收不必要的额外数据。用户可以通过面容 ID 或触控 ID 批准数据共享。
*   **首批支持网站**：Chime、Turo、Uber Eats 和 U.S. Bank。

![ios 26 id verify on web](https://images.macrumors.com/t/3CAB06jxStvfwSsZepzri5m1vtU=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-id-verify-on-web.jpg?lossy)

### 9. 隐私改进

iOS 26 版 Safari 阻止已知的指纹识别脚本访问可能泄露设备特征（如屏幕尺寸）的 Web API，从而减少广告商跨网站跟踪用户的方式。这些脚本也被阻止设置长期存储（如 Cookie）以及读取可能用于导航跟踪的查询参数。

### 10. 报告网站兼容性问题

新增了报告网页问题的功能。在“页面”菜单中，Apple 增加了“报告网站问题”选项，允许用户与 Apple 共享信息以改进 Safari。

## 发布时间

iOS 26 目前已向开发者提供，Apple 计划在 7 月发布公开测试版。经过几个月的测试后，iOS 26 将于 9 月与新款 iPhone 一同发布。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 中的 Safari 带来了多项重大更新。设计上引入了“液态玻璃”外观和更紧凑的标签页布局。Web 应用现在默认从主屏幕启动，无需额外配置。隐私方面，高级指纹识别保护扩展至所有浏览，并阻止恶意脚本。新增了对 HDR 图像、SVG 图标和 WebGPU 的支持，提升了性能和视觉体验。此外，Safari 还集成了数字凭证 API，实现安全的在线身份验证，并改进了隐私控制和网站问题报告功能。iOS 26 预计将于今年秋季正式发布。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 中的 Safari：从设计到隐私的全面更新
items.content:
Apple updated many of its built-in apps in iOS 26, and Safari is one of the apps that has several notable changes. There's a new look, an updated layout, and a new feature set.


This guide features all of the changes you can expect to see in Safari when ‌iOS 26‌ launches to the public this fall.

Liquid Glass Design


Safari adopts the same Liquid Glass design as the rest of Apple's apps, and you'll primarily see it in the address bar, tab view, and buttons.


The buttons and tab bar have the Liquid Glass translucent look, and more of the background of each website is visible beneath them. The tab bar is more compact and it takes up less space, and everything is rounder.

When you scroll down, the tab bar collapses down and you just see a small bar with the website URL, so the entire focus is on the website content. Scrolling back up returns the tab bar to its full size.

Updated Layout


There is a new compact design option in ‌iOS 26‌, but Apple left the option to use the previous Top and Bottom tab view layouts if you prefer those. Layout options are available in the Safari section of the Settings app.


Compact tucks away the share, bookmark, and tab options behind the three-dot button on the left of the tab bar. It's a cleaner look, but it may be frustrating if you often need to access features like the tab menu. There is a back arrow, which splits into forward and back arrow options when you're navigating through content. Settings like Translate and Reader mode are still available by tapping on the small icon next to the URL.


The Top and Bottom views offer the same setup that's available in iOS 18, but with a new Liquid Glass look. Both bars are slimmed down, and no longer take up the full width of the display.


Tab management has been overhauled with the same design changes. The "+" button to open a new tab is still located on the left, and there's now a blue checkmark when you're done interacting with tabs. In the center of the tab view, there's a slider bar that shows your current number of open tabs in the tab group that you're in.


Swiping from left to right allows you to quickly swap between your tab groups. Changing profiles can be done with a dropdown menu at the top of the display, and other tab management tools are available by tapping on the "···" icon.

Web Apps


When you add a website to your Home Screen in ‌iOS 26‌, it will always open as a web app. Web apps have been supported on the ‌Home Screen‌ in earlier versions of iOS, but web developers needed to configure them to operate as web apps.


If websites weren't configured properly, they would open in Safari when added to the ‌Home Screen‌. Now a website will open as a dedicated web app, even if it hasn't been explicitly set up to work that way.

There is an Open as Web App option that can be toggled off when adding a website to a ‌Home Screen‌ if you prefer that websites open up in Safari.

Tracking Prevention


Advanced fingerprinting protection now extends to all browsing by default, rather than only being turned on by default for private web browsing. Apple's fingerprinting protection features are meant to keep websites from tracking your device usage across websites.


HDR Images


‌iOS 26‌ adds HDR image support to Safari. HDR images have a wider dynamic range for brighter whites and deeper blacks, along with improved color gamut. P3 HDR images will now appear as intended in Safari on iPhones with XDR displays.

SVG Icons


Safari supports the SVG file format for icons wherever icons appear in the interface, including the start page, web apps, Safari tabs, menus, and more.

SVGs are superior to PNGs because they can be scaled up without a loss of quality, and in Safari, icons often need to appear at multiple different sizes.

WebGPU


Safari in ‌iOS 26‌ includes WebGPU, a feature that Apple has been testing in Safari Technology Preview. WebGPU is similar to WebGL, but it maps more directly to Metal and the underlying iPhone hardware. WebGPU isn't a user facing feature that you'll be able to use directly, but there will be benefits from it.

Web-based games will be able to achieve higher frame rates and better effects with lower CPU load, plus photo editors, 3D modeling sites, CAD viewers, and websites that do on-device ML should run faster while using less battery. WebGPU requires an iPhone 15 Pro or later.

Digital Credentials API


Apple added support for the W3C Digital Credentials API to Safari, which means a website is able to request identity documents like a driver's license from Apple Wallet for private and secure identity and age verification.


The Verify with Wallet on the Web feature in ‌iOS 26‌ uses the Digital Credentials API and takes advantage of biometric authentication. Websites can ask customers for information like date of birth without receiving unnecessary extra data, and customers can approve the data sharing with Face ID or Touch ID.

The first websites that will support the Verify with Wallet on the Web feature include Chime, Turo, Uber Eats, and U.S. Bank.

Privacy Improvements


The ‌iOS 26‌ version of Safari prevents known fingerprinting scripts from accessing web APIs that can reveal device characteristics like screen dimensions, cutting down on the ways that advertisers can track you across websites. These scripts are also blocked from setting long-lived storage like cookies, and from reading query parameters that could be used for navigational tracking.

Reporting Website Compatibility Issues


A new feature lets you report an issue if you're having trouble with a webpage. In the Page menu, Apple is adding a "Report a Website Issue" option that lets you share information with Apple to improve Safari.

Release Timing


‌iOS 26‌ is available to developers right now, and Apple plans to release a public beta in July. After a few months of testing, ‌iOS 26‌ will launch alongside new iPhones in September.

Read More


We have a dedicated iOS 26 roundup that goes into detail on all of the new features that are available in the update.
Related Roundups: iOS 26, iPadOS 26
Tag: Safari
Related Forum: iOS 26

items.title: 公共服务公告：Anker 因火灾风险召回多款移动电源 (原标题: PSA: Anker Recalls Multiple Power Banks Due to Fire Risk)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## Anker 因火灾风险召回多款移动电源

知名配件制造商 Anker 近期启动了两项独立的移动电源召回计划，部分产品存在火灾风险。

![Anker 移动电源召回](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-MUJFdz358U4px_S4_LIyeILD3U=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/anker-power-bank-recall.jpg?lossy)

### 第一次召回：Anker PowerCore 10000 (型号 A1263)

*   **受影响产品：** Anker PowerCore 10000 移动电源。
*   **销售范围与时间：** 2016年6月1日至2022年12月31日期间在美国销售。
*   **问题描述：** Anker 表示，这些移动电源内部电池可能存在“潜在问题”，导致过热、塑料部件熔化、冒烟，并引发火灾。
*   **识别方式：** 受影响的移动电源底部应有 A1263 型号。Anker 提供了专门的网站供用户查询序列号。
*   **解决方案 (美国)：** Anker 为拥有故障 PowerCore 10000 的客户提供 30 美元的 Anker 官网礼品卡，或免费更换一个 10K Anker 移动电源。更多信息可在召回页面获取。

### 第二次召回：全球范围内的多款型号

*   **受影响型号：**
    *   Anker Power Bank (10K, 22.5W) -- 型号 A1257
    *   Anker Power Bank (20,000mAh, 22.5W, 内置 USB-C 线) -- 型号 A1647
    *   Anker MagGo Power Bank (10,000mAh, 7.5W) -- 型号 A1652
    *   Anker Zolo Power Bank (20K, 30W, 内置 USB-C 和 Lightning 线) -- 型号 A1681
    *   Anker Zolo Power Bank (20K, 30W, 内置 USB-C 线) -- 型号 A1689
*   **问题描述：** Anker 启动全球自愿召回，原因是发现从其某供应商处采购的电池可能存在潜在缺陷。Anker 表示“故障的可能性被认为是极小的”，但出于“高度谨慎”而召回设备。
*   **具体原因 (Anker 中国官网披露)：** 电池单元可能含有杂质或异物，导致短路、过热、冒烟和火灾。部分电池单元可能含有金属颗粒导致短路，而另一些则绝缘不良。部分产品在制造过程中曾暴露于极端高温或受到机械冲击，增加了风险。
*   **识别方式：** 客户可以通过在线召回表格提交序列号或购买凭证进行查询。
*   **解决方案：**
    *   **美国：** Anker 不提供退款，但受影响用户可获得免费更换产品或 Anker 官网礼品卡。
    *   **中国：** 在中国购买设备的 Anker 客户有资格获得全额退款、升级换货或获得原购买价格加 50 元人民币的礼品卡。
*   **Anker 的后续措施：** Anker 在其中国网站上表示，正与供应商合作，建立新的监督和测试协议，以防止未来出现类似问题。

### 处置建议

对于所有被召回的移动电源，Anker 建议客户将其送至市政家庭有害废物处理设施进行处置。
items.shortSummary: Anker 近期因火灾风险召回多款移动电源。首次召回针对 2016-2022 年间在美国销售的 Anker PowerCore 10000 (型号 A1263)，因电池问题可能导致过热和火灾。第二次是全球召回，涉及 Anker Power Bank (A1257, A1647)、Anker MagGo (A1652) 和 Anker Zolo (A1681, A1689) 等型号，原因是供应商电池可能存在缺陷，有短路、过热风险。受影响用户可获得更换或礼品卡，中国用户可退款。Anker 建议将召回产品送至有害废物处理设施。
items.translated_title: 公共服务公告：Anker 因火灾风险召回多款移动电源
items.content:
Popular accessory maker Anker this month launched two separate recalls for its power banks, some of which may be a fire risk.


The first recall affects Anker PowerCore 10000 Power Banks sold between June 1, 2016 and December 31, 2022 in the United States. Anker says that these power banks have a "potential issue" with the battery inside, which can lead to overheating, melting of plastic components, smoke, and fire hazards.

Affected power banks should have the A1263 model number on the bottom of the device, but Anker has a website for checking the serial number. Anker is offering customers who have a faulty PowerCore 10000 a $30 gift card for the Anker website or a free 10K Anker Power Bank replacement. More information is available on the recall page.

Anker's second recall, which is worldwide, is for the following devices:

  • Anker Power Bank (10K, 22.5W) -- Model A1257

  • Anker Power Bank (20,000mAh, 22.5W, Built-In USB-C Cable) -- Model A1647

  • Anker MagGo Power Bank (10,000mAh, 7.5W) -- Model A1652

  • Anker Zolo Power Bank (20K, 30W, Built-In USB-C and Lightning Cable) -- Model A1681

  • Anker Zolo Power Bank (20K, 30W, Built-In USB-C Cable) -- Model A1689


Anker says that it is launching a global voluntary recall because it discovered a potential defect with batteries sourced from one of its vendors. Anker says that the "likelihood of malfunction is considered minimal," but it is recalling the devices "out of an abundance of caution."

There isn't a lot of information about the problem in the announcement on Anker's U.S. website, but Anker's Chinese site says that the battery cells could contain impurities or foreign particles, leading to short circuits, overheating, smoke, and fire.

Some of the battery cells may have metal particles that can lead to short circuits, while others are not properly insulated. Some units were also exposed to extreme heat or mechanical shock during manufacturing, increasing risk.

Customers who may have an impacted Anker power bank can check the serial number or submit proof of purchase through the online recall form.

Anker is not offering refunds in the United States, but affected users can get a free replacement product or a gift card to use on the Anker website. Anker customers who purchased a device in China are eligible for a full refund, an upgrade exchange, or a gift card for the original purchase price plus 50 yuan.

On its Chinese site, Anker says that it is working with its suppliers to set up new oversight and testing protocols to prevent future issues.

For all power banks that are part of the recalls, Anker suggests that customers dispose of them at municipal household hazardous waste facilities.
Tag: Anker

items.title: AirTags 2 何时发布？新功能和发布时间线 (原标题: When Are AirTags 2 Launching? New Features and Launch Timeline)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# AirTags 2 发布时间与新功能展望

苹果自2021年推出AirTags以来，尽管其已成为最受欢迎的物品追踪产品之一，但尚未进行更新。预计AirTags 2将于2025年发布。

## 发布时间线预测

关于AirTags 2的发布时间，存在不同传闻：

*   **彭博社的Mark Gurman** 最初表示新一代AirTags将在年中（即现在）发布。
*   **9to5Mac** 的最新信息则指出，苹果可能在9月的iPhone发布会上首次推出AirTags 2。
*   由于AirTags 2未在6月的WWDC上发布，9月成为下一个更可能的目标日期。
*   Gurman在WWDC前曾表示更新的AirTags“几乎准备就绪”，并且AirTags 2也有可能通过新闻稿而非发布会形式公布。
*   尽管存在不确定性，但普遍认为新款AirTags发布在即，预计在7月至9月之间。
*   **建议：** 如果您计划购买AirTag，建议暂缓，等待苹果的新品发布。

## 设计与电池

*   目前没有关于AirTags 2设计更新的传闻，因此其外观可能与初代AirTag非常相似。
*   预计不会采用可充电电池，这可能令部分用户感到失望。

## 核心新功能

AirTags 2预计将带来以下主要改进：

*   **第二代超宽带（UWB）芯片：** 这将显著提升追踪范围。通过新的技术，用户可以使用“精确查找”功能从最远3倍的距离追踪AirTag。iPhone中的UWB 2芯片的范围约为200英尺，AirTag 2有望达到相同水平。
*   **增强的防跟踪措施：**
    *   苹果计划使AirTag 2的扬声器更难移除，以防止设备被用于跟踪目的。
    *   扬声器的音量也将比之前更大。
*   **与Vision Pro集成（传闻）：** 苹果分析师郭明錤曾提出，下一代AirTags将与Vision Pro集成，以改进空间计算，但具体作用尚不明确。

## 定价与电池续航

*   如果AirTags 2没有显著的新功能，其定价预计不会改变。
*   如果苹果继续使用CR2032电池，电池续航时间也可能保持不变。

## 图片

![airtag 4 pack blue](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ZJSQcgVCwpGEbTNMLZ8dc6VkViI=/400x0/article-new/2024/12/airtag-4-pack-blue.jpeg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果AirTags 2预计在2025年7月至9月发布，可能在9月iPhone发布会亮相。主要升级包括第二代UWB芯片，将追踪范围提升三倍，并增强防跟踪功能，如更难移除和更响亮的扬声器。设计和电池类型预计不变，定价可能维持原状。建议等待新品发布再购买。
items.translated_title: AirTags 2 何时发布？新功能和发布时间线
items.content:
Apple hasn't refreshed the AirTags since their 2021 launch, despite the fact that they've become one of the most popular item tracking products. That's going to change in 2025, and we are expecting the AirTags 2 in the coming months.


Bloomberg's Mark Gurman initially said that the next-generation AirTags would launch in the middle of the year (which is now), but we might have a longer wait. Recent information from 9to5Mac suggests that Apple will debut AirTags 2 in September at its iPhone launch event.

If Apple were going to launch new AirTags in the middle of the year, we probably would have seen them introduced at WWDC in June. That didn't happen, so September is the next likely target date. Gurman did say just ahead of WWDC that the updated AirTags are "nearly ready" to launch, and there is a possibility that AirTags 2 will be announced via press release rather than at an event, so it's still unclear whether Gurman or 9to5Mac is correct.

Rumors agree that new AirTags are not far off, so expect to see them at some point between July and September. If you're planning to buy an AirTag, it's probably worth holding off to see what Apple has in store.

There are no rumors of an updated design, so the ‌AirTag‌ 2 might look a lot like the original ‌AirTag‌. We're not expecting a rechargeable battery either, which is a bit of a disappointment.

The ‌AirTag‌ 2 is expected to include a second-generation UWB chip that improves tracking range. With the new technology, you will be able to track an ‌AirTag‌ with Precision Finding from up to 3x further away. The UWB 2 chip in the ‌iPhone‌ has a range of approximately 200 feet, and the ‌AirTag‌ 2 could match that.

Apple is planning to make the speaker in the ‌AirTag‌ 2 harder to remove, which will prevent people from pulling out the speaker and using the device for stalking purposes. Along those same anti-stalking lines, Apple plans to make the speaker louder than before too.

Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has suggested Apple will integrate the next-generation AirTags with the Vision Pro for improved spatial computing, but it's not quite clear what role AirTags would play.

Pricing is not expected to change if there aren't going to be notable new features, and battery life is also likely to remain the same if Apple is sticking to the CR2032 batteries.

What new features would you like to see in the ‌AirTag‌ 2? Let us know in the comments below.
Tag: AirTags 2

items.title: AirPods Pro 3即将推出的五大功能 (原标题: Five Features Coming to AirPods Pro 3)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
AirPods Pro自2022年以来未曾更新，预计今年将推出新一代AirPods Pro 3，带来一系列令人期待的新功能，使其值得升级。以下是根据现有传闻和代码线索，预计将加入AirPods Pro 3的五大主要功能：

### AirPods Pro 3主要新功能

1.  **健康监测功能**
    *   **心率监测：** 继Powerbeats Pro 2之后，AirPods Pro 3也有望加入心率监测功能。
    *   **体温感应：** 预计将提供入耳式体温读取，相比Apple Watch的皮肤温度检测，能提供更准确的体温数据，尤其对发烧检测更有用。

2.  **音频质量升级**
    *   **H系列芯片升级：** 苹果将升级AirPods中使用的H系列芯片，预计将显著提升音频质量。
    *   **无损音频扩展：** AirPods Pro 2在与Vision Pro配对时已支持无损音频（通过专有无线音频协议），AirPods Pro 3有望将此功能扩展到其他设备。
    *   **蓝牙5.4支持：** 可能采用蓝牙5.4技术，以实现更低的音频延迟。

3.  **更强的主动降噪（ANC）**
    *   **H3芯片：** 新的H3芯片将支持更快的设备端处理，从而大幅提升主动降噪和自适应音频的表现。
    *   **降噪能力提升：** 现有H2芯片每秒可处理48,000次以降低环境噪音，升级后的H系列芯片预计将带来更卓越的降噪效果。

4.  **重新设计的外观**
    *   **充电盒改进：** 预计将借鉴AirPods 4的设计，采用更纤薄的充电盒、隐藏式电容配对按钮和隐藏式LED指示灯。
    *   **耳机本体革新：** 耳机本身也可能进行设计改造，包括更小的入耳部分和更短的耳机柄。

5.  **更新的追踪功能**
    *   **第二代超宽带（UWB）芯片：** AirPods Pro 3有望搭载苹果的第二代UWB芯片，通过“查找”应用实现更精确的追踪定位。
    *   **实时翻译：** 尽管曾有传闻称实时翻译是AirPods Pro 3的专属功能，但实际上，苹果已将此功能推广至所有连接到支持Apple Intelligence的iOS 26 iPhone、Mac和iPad的AirPods型号。

**发布预期：** AirPods Pro 3预计将于今年晚些时候发布，可能在苹果9月份的新款iPhone 17发布会上亮相。
items.shortSummary: AirPods Pro 3预计今年发布，将带来五大核心升级。主要功能包括：心率和体温监测等健康功能；通过H系列芯片升级和蓝牙5.4提升音频质量，并可能扩展无损音频支持；H3芯片带来更强的主动降噪和自适应音频；重新设计的充电盒和耳机本体，可能包括更短的耳机柄；以及搭载第二代UWB芯片实现更精确的追踪。实时翻译功能已推广至所有兼容AirPods。新产品有望在9月与iPhone 17一同亮相。
items.translated_title: AirPods Pro 3即将推出的五大功能
items.content:
Apple hasn't updated the AirPods Pro since 2022, and the earbuds are due for a refresh. We're counting on a new model this year, and we've seen several hints of new AirPods tucked away in Apple's code. Rumors suggest that Apple has some exciting new features planned that will make it worthwhile to upgrade to the latest model.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.


  1. Health Features - Earlier this year, Apple released the Powerbeats Pro 2 with heart rate monitoring, and that functionality is expected for the AirPods Pro 3 too. Temperature sensing is also a possibility. The Apple Watch can detect skin temperature, but that's not accurate for fevers. In-ear temperature readings would provide more useful data.

  2. Audio Quality Upgrade - Apple is upgrading the H-series chip that's in the AirPods, which is likely to bring improved audio quality. The ‌AirPods Pro‌ 2 support Lossless Audio when paired with Vision Pro thanks to a proprietary wireless audio protocol, and Apple could expand that to other devices. The ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ could adopt Bluetooth 5.4 for better audio latency.

  3. Better Active Noise Cancellation - The H3 chip will allow for even faster on-device processing for improved Active Noise Cancellation and better Adaptive Audio. The H2 chip in the ‌AirPods Pro‌ 2 actively reduces louder, intermittent noise at 48,000 times per second to cut down on environmental noise exposure, and an upgraded H-series chip could do even better.

  4. Refreshed Design - Apple is going to update the design of the ‌AirPods Pro 3‌. The AirPods 4 got a slimmed down case, a hidden capacitive pairing button, and a concealed LED, so we could see those same changes with the next ‌AirPods Pro‌. The earbuds could get a design overhaul too, and upgrade possibilities include a smaller in-ear piece and a shorter stem.

  5. Updated Tracking - The ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ are likely to get Apple's second-generation Ultra Wide Band (UWB) chip for more precise tracking using the Find My app.


Live Translation was a feature rumored for the ‌AirPods Pro 3‌, but as it turns out, that's functionality that Apple brought to all AirPods models that are connected to an iPhone that supports Apple Intelligence running iOS 26. Live Translation also works on Apple Intelligence-compatible Macs and iPads.

We're expecting to see the ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ later this year, perhaps at Apple's September event where the new iPhone 17 models will be unveiled.
